Header.title: Glow Like You Mean It
Header.paragraph: Skincare made with love, backed by nature, powered by science.

About.vaev: At Nuvia, we believe that skincare is more than surface deep; it’s a daily ritual of self-love, confidence, and connection with nature. Our journey began with a single mission: to create clean, gentle, and effective skincare that celebrates real skin in all its beautiful forms. We combine ancient botanical wisdom with modern skin science to deliver products that work without compromising your values. Every serum, cleanser, or balm we craft is designed to empower you to glow from within.
About.whyBuild: Our founders were frustrated with the cluttered, chemical-heavy world of skincare. So, we set out to build something different a brand that’s transparent, inclusive, and results-driven, without ever being harsh on the skin or the environment. Nuvia was born out of long hours in labs, countless ingredient trials, and a dream to make skincare simple yet soulful.
forWhom: People who want to simplify their skincare without sacrificing performance
Beauty lovers seeking clean, cruelty-free alternatives
Anyone who believes confidence begins with care

Services.name: Cleansers
Services.heading: Gentle beginnings for glowing skin
Services.details: From gel to cream to foam, our pH-balanced, sulfate-free cleansers remove dirt without disrupting your skin barrier.
Services.comment: Best Seller: Nuvia Aloe pH Cleanser

Services.name: Serums
Services.heading: Targeted solutions, visible results
Services.details: Potent yet soothing, our serums feature Niacinamide, Vitamin C, and Hyaluronic Acid for hydration, glow, and repair.
Services.comment: Customer Fave: Nuvia 10% Niacinamide Glow Shot

Services.name: Moisturizers
Services.heading: Hydration without heaviness
Services.details: Oily, dry, or combo — our moisturizers use humectants and botanicals to lock in hydration without clogging pores.
Services.comment: Top Pick: Rosehip & Ceramide Barrier Cream

Services.name: Sunscreens
Services.heading: Broad spectrum, zero white cast
Services.details: Mineral and hybrid SPF formulas that protect, hydrate, and blend seamlessly into every skin tone.
Services.comment: Editor’s Choice: Nuvia SunSilk SPF 50 PA++++

Services.name: Overnight Treatments
Services.heading: Wake up to better skin
Services.details: Our night masks and exfoliating peels work overnight to restore, renew, and rebalance your skin.
Services.comment: Hero Product: Retinol + Peptide Recovery Mask

Services.name: Body & Lip Care
Services.heading: Not just your face deserves love
Services.details: From buttery lip balms to body scrubs and serums, this range brings full-body glow and nourishment.
Services.comment: Fan Favorite: Mango Butter Lip Hydrator

Testimonials.text: Ever since I started using Nuvia’s Vitamin C serum, I’ve noticed a visible glow and even skin tone.
Testimonials.name: Rohan Mehta

Testimonials.text: My skin has been super sensitive forever, but Nuvia’s cleanser and barrier cream are a godsend. Clean, calming, and no breakouts at all!
Testimonials.name: Ananya Kandelwal

Testimonials.text: I love that Nuvia is transparent about ingredients. Their Retinol Night Mask is my holy grail — I wake up with baby-soft skin!
Testimonials.name: Farida

Testimonials.text: I never cared much about skincare till I tried Nuvia. The products feel luxe yet affordable — and yes, I get compliments now!
Testimonials.name: Aayush R.

Testimonials.text: The Mango Lip Balm is a pocket miracle. No more chapped lips, even in winter. And it smells so good.
Testimonials.name: Jessy Joseph

Testimonials.text: Nuvia isn’t just skincare — it’s self-care. From the minimalist packaging to how each product feels on my skin, I’m in love!
Testimonials.name: Meher A.

Team.name: Keerthana P S
Team.description: With a background in dermatology and a heart full of passion for clean beauty, Ananya started Nuvia to redefine skincare that’s inclusive, gentle, and effective. She’s the visionary behind our philosophy, “Glow like you mean it.”

Team.name: Freni Manoj
Team.description: Freni is our ingredient guru. Whether it's sourcing botanical actives or formulating soothing serums, she ensures every product is as kind to your skin as it is to the planet.

Team.name: Ayush Gupta
Team.description: From managing our social buzz to building real conversations with our customers, Ayush makes sure your voice is always heard and your skincare journey is supported.

Team.name: Dolly Mehta
Team.description: Dolly is the visual soul of Nuvia. She leads all things design, from packaging to campaigns, bringing softness, minimalism, and beauty into every frame.

Team.name: Fathima Neslin
Team.description: Behind every on-time, beautifully packed Nuvia order is Neslin. She keeps things moving, sustainably and smoothly, from the warehouse to your doorstep.

Team.name: Kaushiki Pandey
Team.description: Kaushiki makes sure Nuvia finds the right audience and grows with them. From campaign planning to influencer collaborations, she’s our strategy queen.
